graph_title: Number of in-house trainings per year
indicator_name: Number of trainings offered by the district office on gender-sensitive language use
target_name: Measure - Awareness training on gender-sensitive language use
source_organisation_1: Bezirksamt Treptow-Köpenick - Serviceeinheit Personal und Finanzen
page_content: The indicator shows the number of in-house training sessions on gender-sensitive language use in the administration. Between the years 2012 and 2021, no trainings have taken place in this thematic field.

de.page_content: Der Indikator zeigt die Anzahl der Inhouse-Schulungen zum gendersensiblen Sprachgebrauch in der Verwaltung. Zwischen den Jahren 2012 und 2021 haben keine Schulungen zu diesem Themenbereich stattgefunden.
